      • getNetworkPreference

        public int getNetworkPreference()

      • getActiveNetworkInfo

        public android.net.NetworkInfo getActiveNetworkInfo()
        Return NetworkInfo for the active (i.e., connected) network interface. It is assumed that at most one network is active at a time. If more than one is active, it is indeterminate which will be returned.
        Returns:
        the info for the active network, or null if none is active

      • getActiveNetworkInfoUnfiltered

        public android.net.NetworkInfo getActiveNetworkInfoUnfiltered()

      • getActiveLinkProperties

        public android.net.LinkProperties getActiveLinkProperties()
        Return LinkProperties for the active (i.e., connected) default network interface. It is assumed that at most one default network is active at a time. If more than one is active, it is indeterminate which will be returned.
        Returns:
        the ip properties for the active network, or null if none is active

      • requestRouteToHost

        public boolean requestRouteToHost(int networkType,
                                  int hostAddress)
        Deprecated. use requestRouteToHostAddress instead Ensure that a network route exists to deliver traffic to the specified host via the specified network interface.
        Parameters:
        networkType - the type of the network over which traffic to the specified host is to be routed
        hostAddress - the IP address of the host to which the route is desired
        Returns:
        true on success, false on failure

      • requestRouteToHostAddress

        public boolean requestRouteToHostAddress(int networkType,
                                         byte[] hostAddress)
        Ensure that a network route exists to deliver traffic to the specified host via the specified network interface.
        Parameters:
        networkType - the type of the network over which traffic to the specified host is to be routed
        hostAddress - the IP address of the host to which the route is desired
        Returns:
        true on success, false on failure

      • protectVpn

        public boolean protectVpn(android.os.ParcelFileDescriptor socket)
        Protect a socket from VPN routing rules. This method is used by VpnBuilder and not available in ConnectivityManager. Permissions are checked in Vpn class.

      • prepareVpn

        public boolean prepareVpn(java.lang.String oldPackage,
                          java.lang.String newPackage)
        Prepare for a VPN application. This method is used by VpnDialogs and not available in ConnectivityManager. Permissions are checked in Vpn class.

      • establishVpn

        public android.os.ParcelFileDescriptor establishVpn(VpnConfig config)
        Configure a TUN interface and return its file descriptor. Parameters are encoded and opaque to this class. This method is used by VpnBuilder and not available in ConnectivityManager. Permissions are checked in Vpn class.

      • startLegacyVpn

        public void startLegacyVpn(VpnProfile profile)
        Start legacy VPN, controlling native daemons as needed. Creates a secondary thread to perform connection work, returning quickly.

      • getLegacyVpnInfo

        public LegacyVpnInfo getLegacyVpnInfo()
        Return the information of the ongoing legacy VPN. This method is used by VpnSettings and not available in ConnectivityManager. Permissions are checked in Vpn class.

      • updateLockdownVpn

        public boolean updateLockdownVpn()

        public void supplyMessenger(int networkType,
                            android.os.Messenger messenger)
